page.title: 08RECREATION - SPORT 1
page.content: With few amenities in the area, people have to make their own entertainment. Sport plays an important part in their lives, with a Sports Club based in West Meon with about 100 members. The club is divided into four subsections - hockey, cricket, tennis and football. The hockey club fields two teams in the season. There are three football teams and one cricket team. All teams travel to all parts of Hampshire for away matches. Except for tennis, home matches are played on the Recreation Ground. The tennis club has played regularly at a private home, but is at present busy fund raising to build two courts at the Recreation Ground and then it will be able to join a league.
